projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A fully responsive e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. Features include user authentication, shopping cart functionality, payment integration, and admin dashboard. The project showcases clean UI/UX design and efficient backend architecture.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application designed for teams. Users can create projects, assign tasks, set deadlines, and track progress. The app includes real-time notifications, file sharing capabilities, and comprehensive reporting features.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive weather dashboard that provides current conditions and forecasts for multiple cities. Features include location-based weather, interactive maps, weather alerts, and historical data visualization with beautiful charts and graphs.

projects.name: Social Media Analytics
projects.description: A comprehensive analytics platform for social media managers. The tool aggregates data from multiple platforms, provides detailed insights, generates automated reports, and offers predictive analytics to help optimize social media strategies.

projects.name: Mobile Banking App
projects.description: A secure mobile banking application with biometric authentication, real-time transaction monitoring, and advanced security features. The app provides seamless user experience with intuitive navigation and comprehensive financial management tools.
